Career services for a long-lasting career

Balanced.
Long Lasting.
Interesting.

We specialize in helping people build long lasting careers in tech. Whether you're new to tech, or a well seasoned Principal, we will help you get to where you want to be.

main services

In it for the long haul.

Your career is not a single job, or even a single specialty. We can help you in any part of the journey which is your career.

When you become a member of Cloud Borg, you become a part of a community. A community you can always turn to for help.

Career Path Assessment

This service is designed to help fit possible cloud roles to an applicant based on their previous work background, work preferences and job opportunity locality.

Study Path Assessment

This service is designed to help applicants determine a study path of both free and paid resources and estimate their study

Cloud Project Coaching

This service is designed to help determine the scope of a cloud project to showcase learned cloud knowledge and provide course correction during the end-to-end process

Resume and Social Audit

This service is designed to help applicants best market their cloud knowledge and accompanying cloud projects into one or multiple resume variants as well as to build their social pages eg. LinkedIn

Mock Interview

This service has you sit a mock interview with one or multiple cloud industry members to help prepare you for real interviews.

Job Seeking Support

This service helps you identify how to search for roles and strategies on how to apply, and followup after you apply for retrospective an support

We're Just Getting Started

We need you,
Mentors and Mentees.

We are looking for folks who are willing to help us build our program. Mentors who want to help us build our career progression programs. Mentees who need help with their careers and are willing to provide feedback on the process.

The team

This is us.

Marino Wijay

Co-Founder, Coach

As the founder and CEO of Wrap, and as an interactions and visual design specialist, she knows that user- centred and easy-to-use design is an essential way to distinguish a good product and an awesome product.

Wes Kennedy

Co-Founder, Coach

Wes is a Technical Marketer and IT Infrastructure specialist. He currently works for NVIDIA as a Technical Marketing Engineer. He is passionate about helping people find their perfect fit in the Tech Industry.

Antoni Tzavelas

Co-Founder, Coach

Clare is a senior front-end developer here at Wrap, specialises in building blocks of the web: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. She has almost ten years experiencs in the front-end development.

Andrew Brown

Co-Founder, Educator

Jone started designing web sites back in 1992. Since then, he has worked for a wide range of digital agencies in the UK and America. At Wrap, Jone’s role means solving all kinds of visual design problems.
